value: <l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">The readers faculty is a queer one. He has the power to make</l>

<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">we do not 'know' <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-cmar" key="Marlowe, Christopher">Marlowe</rs>, <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-tdek" key="Dekker, Thomas">Dekker</rs>, <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-ctou" key="Tourneur, Cecil">Tourneur</rs>, <rs type="person" ref="../resources/annotations.xml#psn-jfor" key="Ford, John">Ford</rs>.</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">No scholar will ever now discover them. What we</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">have of them is what it was possible for their</l>
<l xmlns="http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0">actors to <del>convey.</del> <del>a generalised tendency.</del></l>
